title: Formicid (monster)
data:
{{version030}}
''This page is about the formicid [[monster]]. For the player race, see [[Formicid]].''
{{monster info|formicid}}

==Useful Info==
'''Formicids''' are humanoid monsters with ant-like traits. They only appear as [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifters]] or in certain player species-themed [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Pretty much the only way you'll run into one is while fighting shapeshifters. Like the player race, the monster can burrow through walls.

==History==
*Formicids were considered for general inclusion in [[0.14]], but were ultimately disabled outside of vaults.
